Protein Names: Alpha-1,3-mannosyl-glycoprotein 4-beta-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase A (EC 2.4.1.145) (N-glycosyl-oligosaccharide-glycoprotein N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase IVa) (GlcNAc-T IVa) (GnT-IVa) (N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase IVa) (UDP-N-acetylglucosamine: alpha-1,3-D-mannoside beta-1,4-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase IVa) [Cleaved into: Alpha-1,3-mannosyl-glycoprotein 4-beta-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase A soluble form]
